mapper.select: SELECT csNO, memNO, questDF, title, content, state FROM (SELECT csNO, memNO, questDF, title, content, writeDate, state, rownum rn FROM (SELECT csNO, memNO, questDF, title, content, writeDate, state FROM counboard ORDER BY csNO DESC) ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT csNO, memNO, name, title, content, writeDate, state FROM counboard NATURAL JOIN DF_Question ORDER BY csNO DESC

SELECT counboard.csNO, counboard.memNO, DF_Question.name,counboard.title,counboard.content,counboard.writeDate,counboard.state,Member.nickName FROM counboard, DF_Question, Member WHERE counboard.memNO = Member.memNO AND counboard.questDF = DF_Question.questDF
ORDER BY csNO DESC
SELECT questDF, name FROM DF_Question WHERE isYn = 'Y'
